alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 12:55PM MDT until June 22 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wyoming... Wind River at Riverton affecting Fremont County. For the Wind River Basin...including Riverton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wind River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Bankfull stage. Minor flooding downstream along left bank near Black Bridge begins. At 9.0 feet, Flood stage. Minor flooding along the right and left banks upstream of the Highway 789 Bridge. Agricultural flooding downstream of Riverton near the Black Bridge and Hidden Valley area intensifies. At 10.0 feet, Extensive agricultural flooding downstream of Riverton near the Black Bridge and Hidden Valley area. Water begins to encroach homes along the right bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is forecast to crest this afternoon around 10 feet, then slowly fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement.
